name: Polaroid (sh1ft15)
description:
Polaroid

A horror survival game where you're trapped in an unknown mansion filled with weird creatures, fellow survivors and ghastly apparition.

The game have a total of 3 endings.

Note: The build resolution is 960x600, so when opened in full-screen mode, the UI kinda messed up a bit.

'A' and 'D' to move left and right.

'S' to crouch (need to be unlocked)

'Left-Click' to attack (need to be unlocked)

'Space' to dodge roll (need to be unlocked)

'Tab' to open inventory

'Esc' to open setting
